title: Priority Roads Project funded by the China Development Bank Company Ltd
decision_details:
Award of Contracts to China National Aero Technology International Engineering Corporation (CATIC-ENG) - the Government of Sri Lanka and the China Development Bank Company Ltd.  (CDB) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) to establish a framework for corporation to provide financing for infrastructure development projects, mainly for economic development.  The CDB has agreed to provide US $500 million to finance road projects and Cabinet approval was granted to award 5 contracts for the development of the following roads, utilizing US $ 152 million which will be made available immediately:

		*	Beliatta - Tangalle Road ) 15.97 km 
		*	Bopale Junction - Kiri Ibbana - Udamauara Road ) 
		*	Construction of a Flyover at Siribopura Junction 
		*	Pelawatta - Kankotoya Watta - Thiniyawala - Morawaka Road - 47 km 
		*	Horawala - Pelawatta - Pitigala Road - 17.50 km
		*	Thiruwanaketiya - Agalawatta Road  - 33.45 km 
		*	Badulla - Karametiya - Andaulpotha Road - 47.98 km 
		*	Kandy - Mahiyangana - Padiyatalawa Road - 29.13 km
		*	Kalkudah Road )  10.05 km 
		*	Kalkudah - Valachchenai Road )
